official_title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for improvements to coverage and payment under the Medicare program for new drugs, devices, and technology.
short_title: Ensuring Equal Access to Treatments Act of 2017
subjects: Drug safety, medical device, and laboratory regulation

summary.text:
Ensuring Equal Access to Treatments Act of 2017

This bill modifies provisions related to Medicare coverage and payment for new drugs, devices, and technology, including with respect to the new-technology add-on program.
